name: Virtual Underground
description:
This is a open-world London Underground simulation. I have ambitious plans for this game, including:

  • 64-128 player lobbies (around 24 drivers, the rest will be civilians)
  • Highly detailed models
  • A points system
  • An experience system
  • Incentives for non-drivers
  • And much more

Virtual Underground is my testing game for mechanics and systems. You can donate to this project to help fund the full 'Underground Online' game, which I am currently working.

Although this game is only for testing, it give you a bit of time to get a feel of what the full game is going to be like and whether you'd like to help fund the project.
